name: Kaito Claps
description: This is a Vocaloid fansite game thing that is useless. I hope this gets on The Useless Web, even though it's a part of itch.io. Just watch Kaito clap with ice cream on his head because you will possibly unlock Luka and Miku. I don't own Vocaloid, and don't want to make money off of this game. I hope you enjoy, even though this is useless.
